metadata.title: CVE-2021-47347 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:wl1251: Fix possible buffer overflow in wl1251_cmd_scanFunction wl1251_cmd_scan calls memcpy without checking the length.Harden by checking the length is within the maximum allowed size.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
